title: Sticky Wings
directions: Cut chicken wings at the tendons to separate the wingette from the drumette. Discard the tips.
Mix the soy sauce, brown sugar, and garlic salt or powder, along with any other spices or ingredients you wish to add.
Place chicken wings in a sealable bag and marinate with the mixture in the fridge for 1-2 days, turning and mixing the contents of the bag every 12 hours or so.
Arrange wings in a single layer in an over safe pan.
Cook for 1 hour and 15 minutes until done. Allow wings to cool before eating.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon garlic salt or garlic powder
Sealable bags such as freezer bags
